item.title: Starschema Hackathon 2026 aka Challenge Day
item.description: Today was another working Saturday, swapped from January 2nd. Instead of a regular hackathon, we got to choose from different activities. My main goal was simple: make my plotter work. After failing to achieve this in the earlier hackathon, I was determined to finally see it draw.
